ygData.subject: Re: Trading Advice
ygData.msgSnippet: I know what you mean... I ve never been in a group that s tried to screw me, but I ve been in bad groups who had NO CLUE about what they were doing ( Play
ygData.messageBody:
I know what you mean... I've never been in a group that's tried to "screw"
me, but I've been in bad groups who had NO CLUE about what they were doing
("Play the jig, it regenerates mana"; "Why are you playing more than one
song?"; "Why aren't you playing songs that buff the party [when i'm playing
npc damage songs AND weaving some party buff songs]"; or they do dumb things
like pulling creatures that are WAY too hard for the group without telling
us; or clerics who don't save some of their mana for healing and just blast
it away and we die because of it.... the list can go on)... Anyway, I
usually group with guildmates or people I know as well - just plain safer
that way!!

Brangwen Incantare

----- Original Message -----
> From: "Jeff Illian" <jeff@...>
>
> To bad me blacklisting someone in my book doesn't mean anything ;-). I've
> got a list of about 10 KS'ers and 2 "Ninja" looters. I tend to only party
> with people I know or people from my guild now. I hate that bad taste in
my
> mouth when I get screwed.
